Control Name: Performs Data Backup—Procedures are in place for backing up data, monitoring to detect back-up failures, and initiating corrective action when such failures occur.

control_attributes.Control: Performs Data Backup—Procedures are in place for backing up data, monitoring to detect back-up failures, and initiating corrective action when such failures occur.
control_attributes.SubCategory: A1.2 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections, software, data back-up processes, and recovery infrastructure to meet its objectives.
